sentences.en: a judgment from the European Court of Justice
sentences.cn: 欧洲法院的判决

sentences.en: A tide of emotion rose and clouded his judgement.
sentences.cn: 心头涌起一阵强烈的感情，模糊了他的判断力。

sentences.en: Against my better judgement I agreed.
sentences.cn: 我勉强同意了。

sentences.en: All action is based on judgement.
sentences.cn: 一切行动均以判断为基础。

sentences.en: Despite the mixed metaphor, there is some truth in this judgement.
sentences.cn: 尽管有混用的比喻，这个判断还是有些道理的。

sentences.en: good/poor/sound judgement
sentences.cn: 判断力强 / 弱；正确的判断力

sentences.en: he &B{passed judgement on} the accused.
sentences.cn: 他对被告作出裁决。

sentences.en: He could no longer trust his own judgement.
sentences.cn: 他不再相信自己的判断。

sentences.en: He had a name for good judgement.
sentences.cn: 他以判断准确而闻名。

sentences.en: He trusted in his judgement.
sentences.cn: 他相信他的判断。

sentences.en: His judgement was unreliable.
sentences.cn: 他的判断不可靠。

sentences.en: I respect his judgement and I'll follow any advice he gives me.
sentences.cn: 我尊重他的判断能力，会接受他提出的任何建议。

sentences.en: I work very efficiently and am decisive, and accurate in my judgement.
sentences.cn: 我工作非常有效率，处事果断，而且判断准确。

sentences.en: I'd like to reserve judgement until I see the report.
sentences.cn: 我还是想看到报告后再发表意见。

sentences.en: It doesn't affect my judgement one jot.
sentences.cn: 这丝毫不会影响我的判断。

sentences.en: It's very hard to pass judgement on yourself.
sentences.cn: 很难对自身作出评价。

sentences.en: Jake has raised two smashing kids and I trust his judgement.
sentences.cn: 杰克养大了两个了不起的孩子，我相信他的判断。

sentences.en: Remember to be tactful when expressing a personal judgement.
sentences.cn: 记住表达个人看法要婉转.

sentences.en: She had become so fond of him, almost against her better judgement.
sentences.cn: 虽然明知不对，她还是深深喜欢上了他。

sentences.en: Subsequent events verified that his judgement was at fault.
sentences.cn: 接着发生的事件证实了他的判断有误.

sentences.en: The disaster was seen as a judgement from on high.
sentences.cn: 这一灾难被视为上天的惩罚.

sentences.en: The judgement is often biased by interest.
sentences.cn: 判断往往因利害关系而有偏差。

sentences.en: There are no magic tools that can perform estimates for you -- expertise and judgement are required.
sentences.cn: 没有能够为您执行评估的神奇工具——需要的是专业知识和判断力。
